# 6.0 Docs

## Networking

- [Port removed from SPN](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/networking/6.0/httpclient-port-lookup.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change where service principal names don't include a port component for Kerberos and Negotiate authentication.
- [WebRequest, WebClient, and ServicePoint are obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/networking/6.0/webrequest-deprecated.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where WebRequest, WebClient, and ServicePoint are deprecated in favor of HttpClient.
